title.en: Neko no Te datte Yaku ni Tatsu

altTitles.ja: 猫の手だって役に立つ

altTitles.en: Even a Cat's Paw Can Be Useful

description.en:
One day, Takase's beloved cat Mi-chan transforms into a human! Can Mi-chan make Takase, who loves cats but has no interest in human girls, fall in love with her?

(Source: Seikaisha, translated)
description.ja:
猫!? それとも人!?

ある日、高瀬くんが愛でていた猫のみーちゃんが人間に大変身!
なんと、みーちゃんは人間に変身できる猫だった!
猫は大好きだけど、人間には素っ気ない高瀬くんをみーちゃんは振り向かせることができるのか!?

猫大好き&人間キョーミなしの高瀬くんと、人間に変身できる猫のみーちゃんの、猫まみれラブコメ!

altTitles.ja: ドッグスレッド

description.en:
"If he wants to go wild at the ice skating rink, isn't he better off as an ice hockey player?"

The stage is the proud land of the north - Hokkaido. 

The year is 2010. Rou Shirakawa has just received the highest score in history at the All-Japan Junior Figure Skating Championships! But suddenly, he loses control and starts destroying the stage. He is quickly disqualified and banned from the skating world for life.

Now nicknamed "the Rabid Prince," Rou ends up in Tamakomai, an ice hockey town in northern Japan. And on a hockey rink on a frozen lake, he meets the ruthless Genma brothers! Rou will soon learn of the famous Oino-kami high school and their quest to win an unprecedented 20th straight national hockey championship. And also the strong, yet beautiful battle sport - ice hockey!

Change, grow, evolve! Turn defeat into victory in this red-hot redemption story!

Youshou Xihua- a non-canon, spinoff slice-of-life mini-theater of the Youshou Yan Manga unrelated to the main plotline. Go read the main story [here](https://mangadex.org/title/151bca3e-db98-4ad2-8d8d-239943b91437/you-shou-yan).

title.en: Seiyuu Radio no Ura Omote - Yuuhi to Yasumi wa Tomodachi ni narenai?

altTitles.ja: 夕陽とやすみは友達になれない?
パンプキンナイト

description.en: After escaping from a mental institution, a girl with a self-inflicted facial deformity enacts twisted justice on those who mistreated her, face hidden underneath the disguise of a pumpkin.
description.es: Una deforme chica sale con una calabaza en su cabeza para matar a todos aquellos que la acosaron en su pasado después de escapar de un manicomio.
description.fr: Victime de sévices orchestrés aux yeux de tous par ses camarades de classe, une collégienne a été interné dans un hôpital psychiatrique. Plusieurs mois plus tard, alors que ses bourreaux sont aujourd’hui au lycée, ils apprennent qu’elle s’est échappée en tuant tout le personnel hospitalier qui a tenté de lui barrer la route et qu’elle est bien décidé à se venger d’eux.
description.ja: ある日、女子高生・中谷明日美は、SNSで「パンプキンナイト」という見知らぬアカウントからフォローされる。 『中谷明日美コロス』というメッセージが届いた直後、カボチャのマスクを被った殺人鬼に襲われ惨死する。 そして偶然、明日美と通話していた和也にも死の宣告が突きつけられ……。
description.kk: Бет әлпеті қатты зақымданған, оқушы қыз, бұрын оны келеке еткен адамдардың жандарын алу үшін, ауруханадан қашып шығады.
description.pt: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que a maltrataram no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.
description.pt-br: Uma mulher deformada sai com uma abóbora na cabeça para matar todos aqueles que fizeram bullying com ela no passado depois de escapar de um hospital psiquiátrico.

altTitles.ja: お食事はいかがですか？

description.en:
When he lost his ability to taste and smell, Lee Rim’s life as a chef ended. Just as he’s sinking deeper and deeper into depression, Rim discovers [Real], an incredibly immersive VR game that simulates all five senses. There, he’s able to regain his senses of taste and smell. Not only that, but he can cook, too! Although he does need to hunt his own monster ingredients down… Now, Rim is here to cook up delicious food, hunt some dangerous monsters, and maybe even build a whole new legacy along the way. Welcome to Lee Rim’s new life as “Rice”, the gourmet gamer!

title.en: The Dang Clan’s Swordmaster Heir Just Wants a Normal Life

altTitles.en: Becoming the Swordmaster Rank Young Lord of the Sichuan Tang Family
He Became the Head of the Four Heavenly Dang Family
Becoming the Sacheon Dang's Swordsmaster-Rank Young Lord
Became a swordsman-level Sogami of the Sacheondang family

description.en: The Dang clan of Sacheon, once renowned for its poison and hidden weapons, is now on the path to its demise. That is, until Yeonmyeung Dang, an outcast boy of the clan, awakens by recollecting the memories of his past life as the 'god of swords' who devoted his life to mastering the sword. Will the boy be able to protect his family and fulfill his dream of living a normal life?
description.ko:
독과 암기의 명가였지만 지금은 몰락해버린 사천당가.
그곳에서 태어난 당연명은 문득 검에 미쳐 살며
검신의 경지에 이르렀던 전생을 각성한다.

'이번 생은 평범하게 살고 싶다.'

평범하게 살려면, 역시 검술 실력은 숨겨야겠지.
그런데 방해하는 것들이 너무 많다.

title.en: Onii-chan Is Done For! - Highschool ONIMAI (Doujinshi)

description.en: Without being able to return to being a man, Mahiro Oyama stayed as a girl since middle school and now has become a beautiful high-schooler who gets completely dominated by his first friend since the transformation, Momiji Hozuki, who has gotten really tall and became popular with the girls in their school.
description.pt-br: Sem poder voltar a ser homem, Mahiro Oyama permaneceu como uma menina desde o ensino fundamental e agora se tornou uma linda estudante do ensino médio que é completamente dominada por sua primeira amiga desde a transformação, Momiji Hozuki, que ficou muito alta e se tornou  popular entre as meninas da escola.

altTitles.ja: 僕の呪いの吸血姫

description.en:
In Japan, vampires have emerged and are rampaging throughout the country, eating and killing humans. In order to protect his friends, Isuzu, the leader of the anti-vampire security force, plans to kidnap the vampire slayer " Baroque," who is unofficially detained by the government. She is a legendary "vampire" that drives those who see her crazy with her sheer beauty.

[Official English Volumes (Yen Press)](https://yenpress.com/series/my-dear-curse-casting-vampiress)
description.ja: 人間を喰い殺す「吸血鬼」が出現し、猛威を振るうようになった日本。特殊部隊の隊長・緒坂唯鈴は、吸血鬼から仲間を守りたい一心で国が非公式に拘束しているという「吸血鬼バロック」の誘拐を計画。あまりの美しさゆえ、見た者を狂い死なせるという伝説の「吸血鬼殺し」バロック。自らの立場も命も投げうち、彼女に協力を求める唯鈴にバロックは――。

title.en: The Max Level Hero Strikes Back

altTitles.en: The MAX leveled hero will return!
Max Level Hero is Making a Comeback!

altTitles.ja: 最終レベル英雄のご帰還

altTitles.th: การกลับมาของวีรบุรุษเวลตัน

altTitles.pt-br: O Herói de Nível Máximo Retornou!

altTitles.en: The Max Level Hero Has Returned!

description.en:
Struck by an enemy’s arrow, the powerless Prince Davey O’Rowane falls into a coma. His soul travels to a place where the greatest of the great gather — the honorable Hall of Heroes.

There, a thousand years pass as Davey undergoes excruciating training under their watchful eyes to become a hero too strong for his own good. Now back to his timeline and his kingdom, he’s wide awake and the enemies hiding in the king’s court better be prepared - the prince they had dismissed is now their biggest threat!
description.it:
Il debole principe di un paese insignificante, Davey. Dopo essere diventato in coma, la sua anima fuggì in un tempio dove si riunivano le anime degli eroi. Si è allenato per mille anni e ora è tornato come eroe di massimo livello!  
  
“Aspettate solo ragazzi, vi affronterò tutti a testa alta!”  
  
La rinfrescante storia della vita reale e della vendetta di Davey è appena iniziata.
description.ja: 王国内の権力争いに敗れた王子「デイビー」。 昏睡状態の中、魂のみが抜け出して到着したところは、英雄たちの魂が集まる巨大な回廊。 千年もの間苦労した彼が、最高レベルの英雄となって帰ってきた。 "覚悟しとけよ、ちゃんと相手してやるから！" 「デイビー」の痛快な復讐劇と王宮生活記が今始まりますーー！
description.ko:
힘없는 골방왕자 데이비,
혼수상태에서 영혼이 빠져나온 그가 도착한 곳은
영웅들의 혼이 모인 거대한 회랑.

천년동안 굴려진, 그가 만렙 영웅님이 되어 귀환하셨다!

기다려라, 모두
제대로 상대해주마!

데이비의 통쾌한 복수극과 왕궁생활기가 지금 시작됩니다!

**********
악마꼬리 작가님의 인기판타지소설<만렙 영웅님께서 귀환하신다!>를 웹툰으로 만나보세요!
description.ru:
Дейви - бессильный принц маленькой страны.
Когда он впал в кому и его душа покинула тело, она переместилась в огромную галерею душ былых героев.
Взяв все в свои руки, Дейви возвращается.
description.th:
ใครว่าเป็นเจ้าชาย แล้วจะสบายไปหมดทุกอย่าง
'เดวี่ อัล ราวน์' ผู้เกิดมาเป็นเจ้าชาย แต่โชคร้ายถูกตระกูลชนชั้นสูงวางแผนฆ่าทั้งแม่และเขา เพียงเพื่ออยากมาแทนที่คนทั้งสอง

เดวี่ถูกลูกธนูปริศนาเสียบหลัง จนหมดสติ ร่างกายอยู่ในอาการโคม่า มา 6 ปีเต็ม ระหว่าง 6 ปีนั้น วิญญาณของเดวี่ได้อยู่ในระเบียงสถิต ที่ซึ่งเป็นศูนย์รวมเหล่าวิญญาณวีรชนผู้เป็นตำนานแห่งแดนต่างๆ
เดวี่ได้เรียนรู้การใช้เวทมนตร์และศาสตร์ต่างๆ จากพวกเขา จนครบ 1,000 ปีตามเวลาในสถานที่แห่งนั้น

เขาได้ฟื้นขึ้นมาจากเจ้าชายผู้อ่อนแอ กลายเป็นผู้กล้าฝีมือขั้นเทพ 
มาดูสิว่า ในโลกนี้จะมีใครล้มเขาได้อีก
ทีนี้แหละ ถึงคราวเอาคืนทุกคนที่ทำให้เขามีสภาพแบบนี้แล้ว!
description.pt-br: Um fraco príncipe de um país insignificante, Davey. Depois de entrar em coma, sua alma escapou para um templo onde às almas dos heróis se reunem. Ele treinou por mil anos e agora voltou como um herói de nível máximo! “Vocês me esperem, vou enfrentar cada um de vocês!”. A refrescante história de vingança de Davey apenas começou.

title.en: Chika Idol wo Kage de Sasaeru Ore

altTitles.ja: 地下アイドルを影で支える俺

altTitles.en: Supporting an Underground Idol from the Shadows

description.en:
Kageyama, an unremarkable boy, secretly receives a message from gal classmate Natsukawa , saying, “Meet me at the usual karaoke place after school.” 

He goes to karaoke with her alone. There, Kageyama reveals something he had been asked by Natsukawa to show her.
description.pl: Kageyama, niewyróżniający się chłopak, otrzymuje potajemnie wiadomość od koleżanki z klasy, Natsukawy, o treści "Spotkajmy się po szkole w miejscu z Karaoke". Idzie tam z nią sam na sam. Tam, Kageyama pokazuje coś o co został poproszony przez Natsukawe.
description.pt-br:
Kageyama, um garoto normal, recebe secretamente uma mensagem da colega de classe Natsukawa, dizendo: “Encontre-me no karaokê de sempre depois da escola”.

Ele vai ao karaokê sozinho com ela. Lá, Kageyama revela algo que Natsukawa pediu para mostrar a ela.

altTitles.ja: のあ先輩はともだち。

altTitles.en: Noa Is My Senior, and My Friend.

description.en:
A bitter and painful adult's life needs "friends".  Set in a game company, Rihito Otsuka (23), who is your everyday salaryman, and Noa Saotome (27), the ultimate career woman. Two characters whose lives aren't supposed to intersect become "friends" by chance.  A little sweet and slightly heavy office "friends" comedy begins!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ja:
苦くて辛いオトナの人生にこそ、“ともだち”が必要だ。ゲーム会社を舞台に、仕事も人付き合いも“ほどほど”が身上の「平熱さとり系」大塚理人(23)と、何事にも全力すぎる「限界バリキャリ」早乙女望愛(27)。交わらないキャラのふたりが、ひょんなことから「友達」に…？　少し甘くて若干重めな「オフィス”ともだち”コメディ」スタート！

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.ru:
«Друзья» необходимы в горькой и мучительной жизни взрослого человека.

История, происходящая в игровой компании, разворачивается вокруг Рихито Оцуки (23 года), который «умерен» в своей работе и социальных взаимодействиях, и Ноа Саотомэ (27 лет), карьеристки, которая выкладывается на полную во всём, что делает. И эти два непересекающихся характера случайно становятся «друзьями»?.. И так начинается немного сладкая и тяжеловатая «офисно-дружеская» комедия!

---

**Links:** 
- [Alternative Raw (Ch15 Continue Here)](https://ynjn.jp/allEpisodeList/10427)
description.es-la:
La vida amarga y dolorosa de los adultos necesita amistades. Ambientado en una compañía de videojuegos, Rihito Otsuka, un oficinista de 23 años. Que es normal socializando y trabajando. Y Noa Saotome de 27, que lo da todo en todo lo que hace. Dos personaje que a priori no encajan... ¿Pueden ser amigos por casualidad? 
¡Comienza una dulce y pequeña pero pesada comedia sobre amigos de oficina!

title.en: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life

altTitles.ja: 陰キャだった俺の青春リベンジ 天使すぎるあの娘と歩むReライフ

altTitles.ja-ro: Inkya Datta Ore no Seishun Revenge: Tenshi sugiru Ano Ko to Ayumu Re Life

altTitles.ru: Месть моей юности: Моя жизнь с девушкой, которая была слишком похожа на ангела

altTitles.en: The Revenge of My Youth: My Re Life with a Girl Who Was Too Much of an Angel

altTitles.ja: 陰リベ

description.en:
This is the story of Niihama Shincirou, who collapsed after being ravaged by a black company and woke up to find that he had been sent back to his second year of high school. When he wakes up, he finds himself in a time leap to his second year of high school. His high school life …… was gray and shady, but he’s sure he can start over now.

The beautiful girl of his dreams, Haruka Shijouin, whom he met again over time, is even more innocent and cute than he remembered, and above all, she has been staring straight at Niihama.

*“I feel like you’ve changed a lot from the Niihama I knew yesterday. You’re still kind, but you’ve grown up, and that’s wonderful!”*

If I could change the future, I would definitely save her life after she took her own life after being severely bullied. With the adult mentality and corporate power that I’ve acquired, I’m going to take my revenge on my second youth with her–!
description.id: bercerita tentang seorang budak korporat bernama Niihama Shincirou yang bekerja di perusahaan gelap dia pingsan setelah kelelahan bekerja dan ketika terbangun ia terkejut karena ternyata dia mengalami lompatan waktu dan kembali ke masa di mana dia masih seorang murid SMA. lalu karena dia sudah kembali ke masa lalu dia bertekad untuk balas dendam dengan menjadi lebih aktif dan berjuang untuk mendapatkan hal yang dia inginkan tidak peduli siapapun lawannya sampai pada akhirnya menebus semua penyesalan yang telah ia lakukan di kehidupan sebelumnya...
description.ja:
ブラック企業勤めの社畜サラリーマン・新浜心一郎は、過労の末に職場で倒れ――――目が覚めると高校時代に！？
タイムリープ青春"リベンジ"ラブコメ、ここに開幕！
description.pt-br:
Niihama Shinichirou, o qual desmaiou após ser explorado ao extremo por uma ‘companhia exploradora’ e ao acordar descobriu que havia sido mandado de volta para o segundo ano do ensino médio. Sua vida escolar foi sombria e melancólica… No entanto, ele tem certeza de que agora pode recomeçar.
Haruka Shijouin, uma linda garota que ele conheceu antes, de repente parece ainda mais inocente e bonita do que Shinichirou se lembrava, e acima de tudo, ela olha diretamente para ele… 

“Eu sinto que você está bem diferente do Niihama que eu conhecia ontem. Você continua gentil, mas você cresceu, e isso é maravilhoso!” 

Se eu pudesse mudar o futuro, eu definitivamente iria salvá-la depois que ela tirou a própria vida após sofrer severamente por conta de bullying. Com a mentalidade adulta e poderes corporativos que adquiri, eu vou me vingar da minha segunda juventude com ela–!

altTitles.th: Again ย้อนเวลากลับมาป่วน

altTitles.ja: アゲイン！！

description.en: After three unfulfilling years of high school, Imamura Kinichirou was finally graduating. Because of his delinquent-esque looks, he was feared by his classmates, has made no friends, and his greatest regret was not joining the ouendan (cheer club), which was now disbanded. After an accident on the day of his graduation, he and classmate Fujieda Aki are transported three years back in time, freshman again in body but with high-school memories intact. Can Imamura fix the mistakes of his past? Can he re-do his high school years in the way that he's always wanted? Again!! The universe suddenly shouts.

After a trip to the supermarket to stock up on food however, he found himself stranded in a wasteland with no sight of human. Now he's just gonna have to find a way to live in this world aided only by some magic tools and numerous Spirits whom he came into contact with.

description.en:
**Warning:** This Spinoff manga has spoilers from the Light Novel.

After successfully completing the Founding Festival, which includes meetings with the leaders of various countries, a martial arts tournament, technology presentations, and the unveiling of the underground labyrinth, the peaceful daily life in Tempest has returned. Then, Veldora begins to say, "I'm also thinking of developing magic beasts", and the three of them, including Rimuru and Hinata, who are interested in developing new magic, head for the Magic Tower, the sacred place of magic...?

This work is based on the Light Novel, and the timeline is from the end of Volume 9 to the beginning of Volume 10.

altTitles.ja: DRAGON BALL カラー版

description.en: Goku and friends battle intergalactic evil in the greatest action-adventure-fantasy-comedy-fighting series ever! Legend has it that if all seven of the precious orbs called “Dragon Balls” are gathered together, an incredibly powerful dragon god will appear to grant one wish. Unfortunately, the orbs are scattered across the world, making them extremely difficult to collect. Enter 16-year-old Bulma, a scientific genius who has constructed a radar to detect the exact locations of the Dragon Balls. She’s on a mission to find all seven orbs, but first she must convince young Son Goku to join her on her quest. With a monkey tail, superhuman strength and a magic staff for a weapon, Son Goku is ready to set out on the adventure of a lifetime…

description.en: Forty years have passed since his reincarnation, and the guild leader, Girold, has been working diligently. Looking back on his life, he realizes that he hasn't been able to get married, so he tries his best to get a girlfriend, but there is no luck. He thinks he's not popular, but the girls around him are trying to approach him… The harem love comedy from "Shosetsuka ni Narou" begins! (DeepL)

description.en:
At the beginning of the academic year, Saotome Hodaka enrolls into Moteshiro Prefectural High School, a former all-girls school that had recently integrated, but discovers it has a male to female ratio of 1:359! 

While most might think of this as a paradise, the majority of the students are delinquents and Saotome immediately finds himself being extorted by some of the more aggressive girls. However, he is inadvertently saved by Hanako Kuzuryu, a beautiful delinquent who just wants to be left alone.

Is this the start of a new friendship? And how will Saotome's life unfold in a school full of troublesome women?
description.fr:
Au début de l'année scolaire, Saotome Hodaka intègre le lycée préfectoral de Moteshiro, ancien établissement réservé aux filles et récemment devenu mixte. Il découvre rapidement que le ratio garçons/filles est de 1:359 !

Bien que cela puisse sembler être un paradis pour certains, la majorité des élèves sont des délinquantes, et Saotome se retrouve aussitôt extorqué par certaines des filles les plus agressives. Par chance, il est sauvé malgré lui par Hanako Kuzuryu, une belle délinquante qui aspire seulement à être laissée en paix.

Est-ce le début d'une nouvelle amitié ? Comment la vie de Saotome évoluera-t-elle dans une école pleine de filles turbulentes ?
description.ja:
男女比率1対359!!　359人の女子高生にいじられまくり!!　つらたんハーレム学園ラブコメ!!　コワかわ最強ヒロイン爆誕!!
四方八方ギャルだらけな県立茂手城高校に入学した黒一点・早乙女穂高は、ヤンキーJK・九頭竜華子にピンチを救われて…!?
description.pt-br:
Uma proporção de homem para mulher de 1:359?!

Saotome-kun é admitido em uma escola cheia de gyarus e conhece uma garota delinqüente chamada Hanako Kuzuryu.

description.en:
With a broken heart, Hwayoung falls headfirst into the river by accident but wakes up as infamous villainess Satiana Altisee Kaylon. Coming to terms with her new life as sole daughter of House Kaylon, Satiana is soon chosen as a candidate for the next empress! In the palace full of schemers and liars, she must become a cold-blooded villainess to win her royal seat by the crown prince - or her new family will face grave danger!  Will being perfectly evil really be enough? ‘Cause even villains need love!

description.ko:
“난 이미 내 황후를 정했고, 넌 구색 맞추기일 뿐이야.”
“바로 내가 제국의 황후가 될 거예요.”

가장 친한 친구에게 남자친구를 뺏긴 날,
나는 실수로 한강에 빠지고 말았다.
그리고 눈떠 보니 악녀로 이름난 공작영애
샤르티아나 알티제 카일론이 되어 있었다!

알고 보니 이 샤르티아나 영애,
황태자를 그 연인에게서 가로채려 했다고 한다.
그런 악녀 따위는 절대로 되지 않을 거라고 다짐하고 싶지만……
차기 황후 후보, ‘레지나’로 간택되는 순간 내 운명도 결정되었다.

레지나 후보는 둘, 나 샤르티아나와 황태자의 연인 아이린.
모략이 휘몰아치는 궁정에서 사랑하는 가족을 지키기 위해
철저한 악녀가 되어 황후의 자리를 쟁취할 수밖에 없다.
그런데 현실을 받아들이기로 결심한 순간,
차갑기만 했던 황태자 레오프리드가 다른 얼굴을 보이기 시작한다.
그리고 아이린과의 관계에도 무언가 비밀이……?

사랑하는 사람들과 행복해지기 위해, 나는 희대의 악녀가 된다.

달콤살벌한 궁중 로맨스의 새로운 정의!

—

소설에서 풀지 못했던 못 다한 이야기가
지금 여기에서 펼쳐집니다!

[로고 및 표지 디자인] 디자인 그룹 헌드레드

—

웹툰 [악녀의 정의]는 매주 일요일, 주1회 연재됩니다.

description.en: Down-and-out university student Chen Yuan, devotedly pursues Goddess Lin Shutong for three years, gets kicked in the face. In his grief, he accidentally activates the “Licking Dog System” with a memory of 90 trillion Licking Dog Money, solely for licking women. The more you spend, the more you get back, and you can also obtain various attribute bonuses, transforming into a little superhero. It's called the Licking Dog System, but do I really want to be a licking dog? As long as I lick enough, I'll be the king. As long as I prove my love with enough money, I can turn the goddess into my licking dog! At this moment, Chen Yuan, who has undergone a great awakening, embarks on his life as a rich and licking dog.

title.en: To Whom It No Longer Concerns

altTitles.en: For Those of You For Whom Regret Is a Luxury
To Those of You for Whom Even Regret Is a Luxury
To Whom It No Longer Concerns

description.en: Exploited by her brother, betrayed by her sister, and killed by her husband. So ended the tragic story of Ariana Lopez--until, at the moment of her death, she suddenly finds herself back in the past. Now that she has a chance to do it all over again, she enlists the help of Duke Dante Heigenberg, the most feared and desired man in the entire empire, to take revenge against her family and reclaim what’s rightfully hers. But strangely, the duke seems to want Ariana more than just for her extraordinary musical talent...

altTitles.ja: 渦神 - 分裂増殖人間

description.en:
Satoru Takeichi, also known as Ichigo, works at a sawmill. 

While working, he got into a mechanical problem and ended up having the first joint of his right little finger amputated. He and other employees searched for the cut off part, but couldn't find it. 

Ichigo goes straight to the hospital and receives treatment. However, when he returned to his apartment after being hospitalized for a few days, he found another version of him... 

From there, a strange shared life with another [Himself] begins...
description.ja:
渦神 分裂増殖人間製材工場で働いている武市悟(たけいちさとる)、通称イチゴ。

彼は作業中に機械トラブルに巻き込まれ右手の小指の第一関節を切断してしまう。他の従業員と一緒に切り落とした部分を探したが見つからない。

イチゴはそのまま病院へ行き治療を受ける。しかし、数日の入院を経て自宅アパートへ帰ると、【もう 1 人の自分】がいた...。

そこからもう1 人の【二ゴー】との奇妙な共同生活が始まる......。

altTitles.zh-hk: 公主大人，接下來是“拷問”時間

altTitles.zh: 公主大人，接下来是“拷问”时间

altTitles.ja: 姫様“拷問”の時間です

description.de:
Die illustre und militärisch begnadete Prinzessin des Königreiches wurde von Schergen des Dämonenfürsten gefangen genommen und in Ketten gelegt. Darauf bedacht, jede auch noch so kleine Information aus ihr herauszupressen, setzt der Dämonenfürst seine Großinquisitorin darauf an, die Prinzessin zum Reden zu bringen.  
  
Kann sie dieser schier endlosen Folter widerstehen? Oder knickt sie bei den Verhören ein und offenbart ihrem erbitterten Feind vitale Informationen über ihr geliebtes Königreich?  
  
Dies ist die Geschichte jener armen Prinzessin und der Qualen, die sie im Zuge der Verhöre erleiden muss.
description.en: The princess who's been held captive by the Demon Lord's army is scheduled to be executed by the Demon Lord's relentless torture!

description.en:
Kotaro Kudo was known as the "Streets' Strongest". Once, 13 thugs, thirsty for revenge, kidnapped his younger sister Hinami. Kotaro beat everyone, and on the same night, he was arrested on suspicion of murder, as each of them was later found dead. He is then forcefully enrolled to a certain school, in which all students must meet "a special criteria" to enter…  
  


---
description.ru:
Добро пожаловать в нелепый мир, где нет места морали.  
  
Котаро Кудо был известен как «сильнейший на улице». Как-то раз 13 жаждущих мести отморозков похитили его младшую сестру. Котаро разнёс всех, а в скором времени был арестован по подозрению в убийстве, так как каждого из них обнаружили мёртвым. И теперь Котаро отправляют в некую школу, ученики которой должны соответствовать «ряду особых критериев». В школу, где собраны лишь самые отъявленные несовершеннолетние негодяи.  
  
Начинаем историю о выживании в школе повергающих в трепет убийств!

title.en: Kimi to Warui Koto ga Shitai

altTitles.en: I Wanna Do Bad Things with You

altTitles.ja: 君と悪いことがしたい

description.en: Mamori Wataya is a tall but dark, plain, and shady high school girl. One day she meets Kanashi Fuji, who has a small, thin body and an evil-looking smile. A supporting character that no one can find and a villain that no one likes. This encounter turns their gray days blue.
description.ja: 背は高いけど地味で暗い脇役女子・まもり。嫌いだからとプールの水を抜く、学校一の嫌われ者の悪役男子・藤。悪いヤツの、不思議な強さに惹かれていったその先にあったのは、透き通るような青い日々。

altTitles.ja: スーパーボールガールズ

description.en: Ichiyoshi continues to work at a chocolate factory, locking away his "best" in his heart. One Christmas night, on his way home, he finds a mysterious superball that rolls out of the darkness...
description.pt-br: Ichiyoshi continua trabalhando em uma fábrica de chocolate, trancando o seu "melhor" em seu coração. Numa noite de Natal, a caminho de casa, ele encontra uma misteriosa super bola que  cai da escuridão...

altTitles.ja: 妖怪バスター村上

description.en: Terrifying yokai from hundreds of years ago have been released into the present day. Kuin the exorcist stands tall to protect the peace of this world! But in this war of Yokai vs. Exorcist, regular high schooler Murakami has entered the battle! Comedic genius Daiki Ihara's new series is a yokai battle comedy for the modern world! Tagline: The future is now, Yokai!

altTitles.ja: ウィンドブレイカー

description.en: Haruka Sakura wants nothing to do with weaklings—he's only interested in the strongest of the strong. He's just started at Furin High School, a school of degenerates known only for their brawling strength—strength they use to protect their town from anyone who wishes it ill. But Haruka's not interested in being a hero or being part of any sort of team—he just wants to fight his way to the top!
description.fr:
Haruka Sakura est le genre de lycéen qui fait passer la baston avant les révisions. Fraîchement débarqué en ville, c'est donc le sourire aux lèvres qu'il compte pousser les portes du lycée Fûrin, l'établissement scolaire au pire taux de délinquance du pays... Les intentions de Haruka sont claires : se mesurer aux meilleurs bagarreurs de ce bahut et devenir le meilleur de tous ! Mais entre-temps, il se retrouve mêlé à une altercation avec une bande de brutes dans un des quartiers de la ville, avant d'être sauvé in extremis par des élèves de son lycée. Haruka réalise alors à quel genre de phénomènes il risque d'avoir affaire...

Maison d'édition FR : Pika
description.pt-br: A Fûrin High School ganhou a pior reputação entre as escolas da região por ter a média mais baixa e os alunos mais rebeldes. E nela ingressa Haruka Sakura, um jovem que acaba de chegar na cidade, que busca ser o mais forte para poder proteger todos com quem se importa. Para atingir seu objetivo, porém, a primeira coisa que ele deve fazer é se juntar a uma gangue chamada Wind Breaker, que representa seu instituto e cujo objetivo é defender a cidade de outras gangues e bandidos. No entanto, para que eles o aceitem, ele terá que ganhar o respeito deles com os punhos!

title.en: I, Who Have the Natural Charismatic Traits, Was Targeted by Yandere Disciples

altTitles.zh: 天生媚骨的我被病娇徒儿盯上了

altTitles.zh-ro: Tiansheng Meigu De Wo Bei Bing Jiao Tu Er Ding Shangle
Tiānshēng Mèigǔ De Wǒ Bèi Bìng Jiāo Tú Er Dīng Shàngle

altTitles.vi: Trời Sinh Mị Cốt, Ta Bị Đồ Nhi Yandere Để Mắt Tới

description.en: After losing all magical powers, Bing Yuanzi was caught by a female disciple with ulterior motives. Witnessing a disciple she had painstakingly raised harboring malicious intentions, the master drank the last vial of a transformative potion, intending to erase her own existence. Unexpectedly, instead of disappearing, she became the legendary natural beauty, with allure and beauty reaching maximum levels. At the same time, the next words from her female disciple sounded behind her: “Master, you wouldn’t want your loss of magical powers to be known by our enemies, would you?
After being reborn, Sayi vows to break free of her foster mother’s control.
description.uk: Будучи маріонеткою своєї прийомної матері, Саї ніколи не була вільною. Вона була безсила дати відсіч і перебувала у владі інших. Після переродження вона вирішує все це змінити.

altTitles.ja: 吸血姫【ヴァンパイア】美夕 朔
吸血姫美夕 朔

altTitles.th: ขบวนการกำมะลอ

altTitles.ja: 戦隊大失格

description.en:
Thirteen years ago, suddenly the Villainous Army of evil appeared in their gigantic floating castle 10000 meters in the sky to invade Earth!

The villainous army have reviving capabilities that make them immortal, making them a serious threat to humanity. To protect us against these invaders, the Divine Dragon Rangers, the Dragon Keepers, wield their miraculous powers and their weapons, Divine Tools, and continuously fight for our safety!

The assault of the Villainous Army! The vigilance of the Dragon Keepers! Will they succeed in their conquest…?

From Haruba Negi, the creator of *5Toubun no Hanayome*, comes the action-packed superhero series of a lifetime!
description.es: ¡Hace trece años, el Ejército Villano del mal apareció de repente en su gigantesco castillo flotante a 10.000 metros en el cielo para invadir la Tierra! El ejército villano tiene capacidades de revivir que los hacen inmortales, lo que los convierte en una seria amenaza para la humanidad. Para protegernos de estos invasores, los Rangers Dragón Divino, los Guardianes del Dragón, empuñan sus poderes milagrosos y sus armas, las Herramientas Divinas, ¡y luchan continuamente por nuestra seguridad! ¡El asalto del Ejército Villano! ¡La vigilancia de los Guardianes del Dragón! ¿Tendrán éxito en su conquista? ¡Descúbrelo en la serie de superhéroes llena de acción de toda la vida!
description.fr:
Il y a 13 ans, un château flottant est apparu à 1000 mètres au-dessus du sol et une armée maléfique est venue dans le but d'envahir l'humanité.
Afin de protéger l'humanité contre ces envahisseurs, des super-héros se battent, mais les choses ne semblent pas être comme elles le paraissent !
description.ru: Тринадцать лет назад армия монстров таинственным образом объявилась на территории людей, паря в воздухе на своем летучем замке! Армия монстров обладает различными способностями, которые могут грозить человеческой безопасности. Дабы защитить мирных жителей от вторжения на землю, доблестные герои - Хранители Дракона в составе из пяти человек выходят на поле правосудия! Используя свой туз в рукаве под названием «артефакт», боевой отряд героев из года в год, каждое воскресенье усмиряет неугомонных монстров. Однако, спустя 999 поражений, один из членов команды монстров решает отомстить героям!.. С этого момента и разворачивается наша история борьбы добра со злом!
description.pt-br: Há treze anos, de repente, o Infame Exército do mal apareceu em seu gigantesco castelo flutuante 10.000 metros no céu para invadir a Terra! O exército vilão tinha capacidades de reviver, o que os tornava imortais, tornando-os uma séria ameaça para a humanidade. Para nos proteger contra esses invasores, os Divine Dragon Rangers, os Dragon Keepers, manejam seus poderes milagrosos e suas armas, Ferramentas Divinas, e lutam continuamente por nossa segurança! O ataque do Exército Vilão! A vigilância dos Dragon Keepers! Eles terão sucesso em sua conquista...?

altTitles.ja: 邪神ちゃんドロップキック

description.en:
Jashin-chan Dropkick is a violent slapstic comedy about a delusional gothic lolita, Yurine, who summons a demon girl with the tail of a cobra, Jashin-chan.
They'll have to live together until Yurine finds a way to send Jashin-chan back to hell, or until Jashin-chan kills Yurine.

---

[Anime Season 1 on ANN](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/encyclopedia/anime.php?id=20484)
description.ja:
魔界の悪魔、通称「邪神ちゃん」は、ある日突然、人間界に召喚されてしまう。
彼女を召喚したのは、神保町のボロアパートで暮らす、ちょっとブラックな心を持つ女子大生、花園ゆりねだった。しかもゆりねは、邪神ちゃんを魔界に帰す方法がわからないと言う。仕方なく一緒に暮らし始めた邪神ちゃんとゆりね。しかし、召喚者が死ねば魔界に帰れることから邪神ちゃんはゆりねを……!?
少女と邪神ちゃんが繰り広げるちょっとキケンな同居生活コメディ！
description.pt-br:
Jashin-chan Dropkick é uma comédia violenta sobre uma lolita gótica, Yurine, que invoca uma garota demônio com um rabo de cobra, Jashin-chan.
Elas terão que viver juntas até que Yurine encontre uma maneira de enviar Jashin-chan de volta ao inferno, ou até que Jashin-chan mate Yurine.

altTitles.ja: 推しの下僕になりまして

description.en: The protagonist, grieving the death of her favorite character, finds herself reincarnated into the game's world before her beloved's demise! As the mob character Lou Lurea, she resolves to save her favorite character no matter what. However, she is reincarnated into a magical academy filled with handsome vampires. As the only human, Lou is nothing more than a delicious treat to everyone. While being pursued as "prey" by the characters, she struggles to prevent her favorite's bad ending...?! A story begins where love for her favorite character changes destiny!

Having suffered several setbacks in her attempt to be a voice actor, Chi Yu no longer dares to bring up her hobby of dubbing in front of others. Instead, she covertly tunes in to voice drama broadcasts on Lily Radio. One day, during a public lecture at her university, she discovers that Yu Chen from the neighboring college shares a strikingly similar voice to the host of Lily Radio.

title.en: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka Doesn't Get it

altTitles.ja-ro: Fate/Grand Order: Fujimaru Ritsuka wa Wakaranai

altTitles.ja: Fate/Grand Order 藤丸立香はわからない

altTitles.fr: Fate/Grand Order : Ritsuka Fujimaru n’a rien pigé

description.en: Ritsuka Fujimaru—humanity's last master. It would not have been possible to restore humanity without him. However, he does have a shortcoming... he is far too honest! A slapstick comedy in which Fujimaru's simple questions sway the heroic spirits!

altTitles.de: Ich würde mir gerne eine Freundin ausleihen

altTitles.th: สะดุดรักยัยแฟนเช่า

altTitles.ja: かのかり
彼女、お借りします

altTitles.vi: Dịch Vụ Cho Thuê Bạn Gái

description.en:
Kinoshita Kazuya is a regular college student who was just dumped by his girlfriend for another guy. Feeling down in the dumps, he decides to use an app called Diamond to hire Mizuhara Chizuru, a rental girlfriend, to make himself feel better. From their first meeting, she seems to be the perfect girl for him, but is there more to her than meets the eye? And how will their not quite typical relationship develop?

---
**Links:**

- Alternative Official English - [K MANGA](https://kmanga.kodansha.com/title/10001/episode/312699) (U.S. Only), [Kodansha](https://kodansha.us/series/rent-a-girlfriend/)
description.fr: Kinoshita Kazuya est un étudiant régulier qui vient d'être largué par sa petite amie pour un autre gars. Se sentant dans les décharges, il décide d'utiliser une application appelée Diamond pour embaucher Mizuhara Chizuru, une petite amie de location, afin de se sentir mieux. Dès leur première rencontre, elle semble être la fille parfaite pour lui, mais est-ce qu'il y a autre chose pour elle que ce qui est à l'oeil? Et comment va se développer leur relation pas tout à fait typique?
description.it: Kinoshita Kazuya è un normale studente universitario che è stato appena lasciato dalla sua ragazza. Devastato, decide di usare un app chiamata "Diamond" per reclutare Mizuhara Chizuru, una ragazza a noleggio per tirargli su il morale. Fin dal loro primo incontro, sembra essere la ragazza perfetta per lui, ma ci sarà altro dietro a quell'immagine da "brava ragazza"…? E come si evolverà la loro inusuale relazione?
description.pt: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar uma aplicação de relacionamentos depois de ter levado terminado com a sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!
description.ru: Двадцатилетний никудышный студент университета муниципального района Киносита Кадзуя. Встреча с «особенной» красавицей ознаменует начало изменений в его жизни?!
description.es-la: Kinoshita Kazuya es un estudiante universitario normal al que su novia acaba de dejar por otro chico. Sintiéndose deprimido, decide usar una aplicación llamada Diamond para contratar a Mizuhara Chizuru, una novia de alquiler, para sentirse mejor. Desde su primer encuentro con ella, parece ser la chica perfecta para él, pero ¿hay más en ella de lo que parece? ¿Y cómo se desarrollará su relación no muy típica?
description.pt-br: Kazuya Kinoshita é um estudante universitário inútil que decide utilizar um aplicativo de relacionamentos depois de ter levado um fora de sua namorada. Assim, o rapaz conhece uma bela garota chamada Chizuru Mizuhara e a vida dos dois começa a mudar a partir daí. O que nos espera nesta incrível comédia romântica?!

description.en: Lin Ling is unfortunate in everything she does… Until the day she met Fang Wan, a kind and perfect upperclassman. She unconsciously grew attracted to her. Somewhere in the vast universe, there is always someone who is closely connected with you, and if fate allows it, you will never be alone.

altTitles.ja: マウントセレブ金田さん

description.en: Mochiko Kaneda (commonly known as Kaneda-san), a self-important, clumsy sanpaku-eyed celebrity lady, climbs to the top with overwhelming financial power!!

altTitles.ja: テニスの王子様

description.en:
Ryoma Echizen just joined the Seishun Academy's tennis team, which is known for being one of the most competitive teams in Japan. Its members are incredibly talented, gifted, and athletic. With rigorous and extremely intense practices, the upperclassmen of the team expect the very best from themselves and they expect even more from the new members of the team. While most of the freshmen are on pins and needles hoping they won't get cut from the team, Ryoma Echizen is confident, cool, and collected. Some might even say he's cocky, but at least he's got the skills to back up his attitude. With his virtually unreturnable "twist serve," Ryoma is sure to make the starting team.  
  
Join Ryoma and the other first years, as they train hard, make friends, and try to find a place for themselves on the team. Ryoma Echizen is the Prince of Tennis. He may be ready for the Seishun Academy tennis team, but are THEY ready for HIM?

altTitles.en: Tales of a Hundred Ghosts Traveling by the Night

description.en:
Ritsu inherited his sixth sense from his grandfather, along with a demon guardian named Blue Storm. Strange things just seem to happen around these two, and it's left to them to get to the bottom of all these mysterious events. Each story is independent but features recurring characters you'll come to know and appreciate as they, each in their own way, try to deal with things 'not of this world'.  
  
Winner of Award for Excellence in 10th Annual Japan Media Arts Festival.

title.en: Hajime no Ippo - The First Step

altTitles.th: ก้าวแรกสู่สังเวียน

altTitles.ja: はじめの一歩

description.en:
Makunouchi Ippo is an ordinary high school student in Japan. Since he spends most of his time away from school helping his mother run the family business, he doesn't get to enjoy his younger years like most teenagers. Always a target for bullying at school, Ippo's life is one of hardship. One of these after-school bullying sessions turns Ippo's life around for the better, as he is saved by a boxer named Takamura. He decides to follow in Takamura's footsteps and train to become a boxer, giving his life direction and purpose. Ippo's path to perfecting his pugilistic prowess is just beginning.

Official Release:
- Indonesian release by Level Comics as **Fight!! Ippo** (2006-ongoing)
description.pt-br: Ippo Makunouchi, um tímido estudante de ensino médio, é um dia salvo se der espancado, por Takamura, um boxeador. Encantado pelas habilidade de Takamura e por vídeos de boxe, Ippo decide enfrentar o mundo profissional do boxe!

altTitles.ja: 推しの子

altTitles.th: 【เกิดใหม่เป็นลูกโอชิ】

altTitles.ja: 【推しの子】

altTitles.pt-br: Oshi no Ko - Minha Estrela Preferida

description.el:
H Άι Χόσινο είναι ένα ανερχώμενο μουσικό είδωλο, η οποία ανακοίνωσε ξαφνικά οτι θα πάρει ενα διάλειμμα από το μουσικό της γκρουπ, Μπι-Κομάτσι, για λόγους υγείας. Προς εκπλήξη ενός από τους μεγαλύτερους θαυμάστες της, του γυναικολόγου Γκόρο Αμεμίγια, μια μέρα η νεαρή Αϊ εμφανίστηκε στο νοσοκομείο οπού δουλεύει. Ο Γκόρο έρχοντας πλεον πρόσωπο με πρόσωπο με την αδυναμία του, τρέμει στο γεγονός ότι η 16-χρονη Αϊ είναι έγκυος... με δίδυμα με τον πατέρα άφαντο. Αποφασισμένη να αποκτήσει την δικιά της οικογένεια και να συνεχίσει την δουλεία της ως είδωλο, έχει σκοπο να κρατήσει την γέννα των παιδιών της μυστικο, μαζί με την βοήθεια του Γκόρο.

Το δυνατότερο όπλο ενός ειδώλου ειναι τα ψέματα.
Μια ίστορια μυστηρίου και εξαπάτησης, όπου η σκοτεινή πλευρά της σόου-μπιζ αποκαλύπτεται κάτω από τις στρώσεις ψεμάτων και εκμεταλεύσεων.
description.en:
The story begins with a beautiful girl, her perfectly fake smile, and the people who love her selfishly for it.  
  
What transpires behind the scenes of the glittering showbiz industry? How far would you go for the sake of your beloved idol? What would you do if you found out reincarnation was real? The star of the show is Aquamarine Hoshino and the stage is but a mere facade. Will he manage to reach the climax before the world of glamour swallows him whole?
description.es:
'Oshi no Ko' explora la vida de una abrumadoramente hermosa heroína y muestra la industria del entretenimiento desde un punto de vista nunca antes visto.

- [Wikipedia](https://es.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.fa: آی هوشینو ۱۶ ساله یک آیدول با استعداد و زیباست که هواداران زیادی داره؛اون نماد پاکیه، ولی ظاهر با باطن قضیه متفاوته. گورو هوندا یک پزشک زنان که ساکن حومه‌ی شهره که یکی از طرفداران بزرگ آی هستش، ولی ناگهان آیدول مورد علاقه خودش رو ملاقات میکنه و متوجه میشه که اون بارداره، گورو به اون قول میده که بچش رو سالم بدنیا بیاره، ولی اون نمیدونست که این ملاقات باعث عوض شدن زندگیش میشه.
description.fr:
L'histoire commence avec une belle fille, son sourire parfaitement faux, et les gens qui l'aiment égoïstement pour cela. Que se passe-t-il dans les coulisses de la brillante industrie du showbiz? Jusqu'où iriez-vous pour votre idole bien-aimée ? Que feriez-vous si vous découvriez que la réincarnation est réelle? La star du spectacle est Aquamarine Hoshino et la scène n'est qu'une simple façade. Parviendra-t-il à atteindre le point culminant avant que le monde du glamour ne l'avale tout entier?  


---

- [Nominated for the 14th annual Manga Taisho awards.](https://www.animenewsnetwork.com/news/2021-01-24/14th-manga-taisho-awards-nominate-10-titles/.168759)

- [Wikipedia](https://fr.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_ko)
description.ja: 「この芸能界（せかい）において嘘は武器だ」　地方都市で、産婦人科医として働くゴロー。芸能界とは無縁の日々。一方、彼の“推し”のアイドル・星野アイは、スターダムを上り始めていた。そんな二人が“最悪”の出会いを果たし、運命が動き出す…!?
description.ru:
Что, если бы дорога в шоу-бизнес была открыта для тебя с самого начала?  
Новая серия оригинальной манги от двух известных авторов — Акасака Ака («Госпожа Кагуя: в любви как на войне») и Ёкояри Мэнго («Тайные желания отвергнутых»). Это совершенно новая работа, в которой мир шоу-бизнеса предстаёт перед читателями в очень необычном свете: у лидера идол-группы Хосино Аи есть секрет, о котором никто не должен знать…  


---
- [Wikipedia](https://ru.wikipedia.org/wiki/Oshi_no_Ko)
description.vi:
Câu chuyện khởi đầu với sự xuất hiện của một cô gái xinh đẹp, mang nụ cười giả tạo hoàn hảo, và có những người yêu cô ấy một cách ích kỷ bất chấp điều đó.

Điều gì diễn ra đằng sau ánh hào quang của thế giới showbiz? Con người ta sẽ làm đến mức nào vì thần tượng yêu quý của mình? Bạn sẽ làm gì nếu phát hiện ra luân hồi chuyển kiếp là có thật? Nhân vật chính của chúng ta - Aquamarine Hoshino liệu có hoàn thành được khát vọng báo thù trước khi bị thế giới hào nhoáng ấy nuốt trọn? Hãy cùng đón xem bộ truyện được sáng tác bởi bộ đôi tác giả của Kaguya-sama và Kuzu no Honkai.
description.es-la:
La historia comienza con una hermosa chica, su sonrisa perfectamente falsa y la gente que la ama con egoísmo gracias a eso.
  
¿Qué ocurre detrás de la brillante industria del espectáculo? ¿Hasta dónde llegarías por el bien de tu ídolo? ¿Qué harías si descubrieras que la reencarnación es real? La estrella del espectáculo es Aquamarine Hoshino, y el escenario no es más que una mera fachada. ¿Conseguirá llegar al clímax antes de que el mundo del espectáculo se lo trague por completo?
description.pt-br: Doutor Goro é obstetra em um hospital do interior e se encontra longe do mundo em que brilha e evolui Aï Hoshino, uma cantora de sucesso crescente da qual é fã absoluto. O que ele ainda não sabe é que sem mais nem menos ele se encontrará com sua idol favorita em uma circunstância um pouco fora do normal. Terá ele tempo suficiente para ficar perto dela ou o mundo irá girar de maneira cruel para ele? Essa é uma história sobre o mundo do entretenimento japonês.

altTitles.en: Death's Daughter and the Ebony Blade
The Little Girl Raised by Death Holds the Sword of Death Tight

description.en:
Olivia is just a baby when the mysterious Z finds her at a temple in the depths of the Forest of No Return. From that day on, the temple becomes her home and Z her family. Z, a god of death, educates her in the ways of the world, in combat, and in the long-forgotten arts of magic—right up until the day Z disappears. 

Olivia leaves the forest for the first time in search of Z with its ebony blade in hand. Out in the wider world, all is not well. A bitter war rages between the Asvelt Empire and the Kingdom of Fernest, and Fernest is losing badly. When Olivia shows up on Fernest’s doorstep with a sack of imperial heads looking to volunteer, the royal army happily welcomes her into its ranks. Thanks to Z’s training, she quickly proves herself as a ferocious warrior. In fact, she might be just what Fernest needs to turn the tide of the war...but will they accept her lack of people skills and disregard for discipline? And will she ever see Z again?

[Official English Light Novel](https://j-novel.club/series/death-s-daughter-and-the-ebony-blade)
description.pt: No fundo de um santuário esquecido dentro da floresta, um bebê é encontrado por figuras sombrias, os deuses da morte. Um deles, Zett, a pegou para usá-la como "objeto de observação" contra o desejo de seus irmãos de comer sua alma. Zett lhe deu vários conhecimentos e a treinou para lutar. Até que um dia ele de repente desapareceu, deixando-lhe uma carta e uma espada negra. Então, tendo crescido, Olivia saiu em busca de Zett. Esta é a história de Olivia Valedstorm, a garota criada pela morte, enquanto muda o curso da guerra com seu temido título de Shinigami.
